result.adr_address: Jing Long Commercial Building, 52 Tang Lung St, Bowrington, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Jing Long Commercial Building, 52 Tang Lung St, Bowrington, Hong Kong
result.name: The Point - Pizza & Pasta

reviews.text: Nice shop in Causeway bay for pizza and pasta. Really a no-frills dining room, with quick service, quality food and more value for money than the price tag and seating arrangements would initially lead you to believe. Good fill and nice experience if you're looking for something simple done well.

This place is more casual than other Italian resto. The portion of pasta was rather small though it’s delicous. Pizza and dessert are also tasty! And refreshing drinks. Very quick service! Will come back ,definitely.
Tasty food (pizza, pasta and great dessert) with good service. About US$30 per person for a set dinner.
Delicious food, and the place is good for friends' chatting

It's just okay here. Definitely doesn't taste very authentic Italian - everything seems to have been adjusted for a more Hong Kong audience flavour. Whether that's a good or bad thing depends on your personal preferences. Portions are medium sized, service is fine.

result.adr_address: 香港鵝頸登龍街52號景隆商業大廈
result.formatted_address: 香港鵝頸登龍街52號景隆商業大廈
result.name: The Point - Pizza & Pasta

reviews.text: Nice shop in Causeway bay for pizza and pasta. Really a no-frills dining room, with quick service, quality food and more value for money than the price tag and seating arrangements would initially lead you to believe. Good fill and nice experience if you're looking for something simple done well.

This place is more casual than other Italian resto. The portion of pasta was rather small though it’s delicous. Pizza and dessert are also tasty! And refreshing drinks. Very quick service! Will come back ,definitely.
位置和環境吾錯，我們今次食lunch,叫左Pizza，意粉及龍蝦套餐。味道和份量幾好。

2人套餐， 飲品 淡波蘿汁 怪味 梳打水。頭盤煙三文魚，上放紫蘇及 爛葉 蘿蔔苗（真不明白，蘿蔔苗葉子都腐爛，都放上碟），凍烤茄子（像從雪櫃拿出來??） 配黑醋、生菜 沙律，跟著 煙三文魚及三文魚子、熟三文魚碎、露荀、白汁、天使細麵，煮得不錯，是可以的，最後是 慢煮鴨胸、芝士，藍芝士、甜酸紫洋蔥、仿蜜糖、香脆合桃、烤蔥絲 Pizza，口味創新，還可以，但最失敗是鴨胸，又韌 又亁 又無肉味 更帶點“嗌”味（熟肉煮好放超過一天，就會有此味），"慢煮"到如此之鴨胸，實在另人出奇 搖頭 又意外。 =.= 倒不如配幾塊 金妹火腿 還好。 唉！!

星期六晚唔算太餓周街撞手神食飯～
睇下邊到有位就入～
8點令來到登龍街～
見呢個餐廳有吉位即刻攞位再算～
2個人唔係叫左好多野食～
龍蝦通粉～龍蝦肉係撈埋入通粉～夠哂味～
野菌溫泉蛋好重牛油香味～
甜品蘋果pizza都ok~
唔太甜～
上菜速度就唔算快～
餐廳樓底好高～
但掛左個幾大招牌上去又唔開燈～
怪怪地咁～
下次可以再來試多次～

result.vicinity: 鵝頸登龍街52號景隆商業大廈

result.adr_address: 香港銅鑼灣登龍街52號景隆商業大廈9樓 9/F, Jing Long Commercial Building, 52 Tang Lung St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 香港銅鑼灣登龍街52號景隆商業大廈9樓 9/F, Jing Long Commercial Building, 52 Tang Lung St, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: 素 喜 館 Su Xi Cafe

html_attributions: 素 喜 館 Su Xi Cafe
素 喜 館 Su Xi Cafe
素 喜 館 Su Xi Cafe

reviews.text: Nice tucked-away vegetarian restaurant. Dinner combo a bit pricey but does include 4 courses. The beet soup was fresh and satisfying, albeit a little bland. Otherwise, flavours were generally good, with good presentation, but I felt at this price that the texture of the sauce for my spaghetti should have been better (it was a bit watery), and there should have been some fresh parmigiano on top rather than the small amount which was incompletely melted into the sauce. I would suggest avoiding the truffle options, as they use some mild-flavoured product from a jar.
Yummy and affordable. Some investigation and insistence needed to ensure what you’re getting is vegan. Very fast free WiFi.

Visited for dinner with friend. Excellent food with very welcoming and helpful staff. Impressed by the degree of detail and thought taken on each dish. More than a healthy and delicious meal - a great way to spend an evening in relaxed and homely surroundings.

Nice food and friendly staffs, and they accept cash only.
Su Xi cafe more like a western vegetarian restaurant, as they serve more on western food, rather then Chinese one.
Their dishes are not common, and the taste tends to bland, which is good as you don't need heavy taste all the time.
They are not packed during lunch, so you can just take your time and enjoy your lunch.
And they always have buy 8 get one free promotion for lunch set
Nice and comfortable place to get together to enjoy nice food!
